listeningQuestion.question: What was the speed of the winning car?
listeningQuestion.translation: 获胜的汽车速度是多少？

editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个关于老式汽车比赛的故事。文章主要使用了比较关系的表达方式，包括as...as、the same as、different from等结构。文章还涉及了多个与汽车相关的词汇，如speed、course、rival等，以及一些形容词的用法区别，如handsome、beautiful、pretty等。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
notes: Once a year, a race is held for old cars.
A lot of cars entered for this race last year and there was a great deal of excitement just before it began.
One of the most handsome cars was a Rolls-Royce Silver Ghost.
The most unusual car was a Benz which had only three wheels.
Built in 1885, it was the oldest car taking part.
After a great many loud explosions, the race began.
Many of the cars broke down on the course and some drivers spent more time under their cars than in them!
A few cars, however, completed the race.
The winning car reached a speed of forty miles an hour -- much faster than any of its rivals.
It sped downhill at the end of the race and its driver had a lot of trouble trying to stop it.
The race gave everyone a great deal of pleasure.
It was very different from modern car races but no less exciting.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 旧式汽车的比赛每年举行一次。
去年有很多汽车参加了这项比赛。比赛开始之前，人们异常激动。
最漂亮的汽车之一是罗尔斯-罗伊斯生产的银鬼汽车。
而最不寻常的一辆则要属只有3只轮子的奔驰牌汽车了。
该车造于1885年，是参赛车中最老的一辆。
在好一阵喧闹的爆炸声之后，比赛开始了。
很多汽车在途中就抛了锚，而有些驾驶员花在汽车底下的时间比坐在汽车里面的时间还长。
然而还是有几辆汽车跑完了全程。
获胜的那辆车达到了时速40英里——远远超过任何对手。
它在接近终点时，冲下了山坡，驾驶员费了好大劲才把车停下来。
这次比赛使每个人都挺开心。
它虽然与现代汽车比赛大不相同，但激动人心的程度并不亚于现代汽车大赛。

notes.title: 比较关系的表达
content: as...as表示'和...一样'，如：as fast as sound
the same (...) as表示'与...相同/同样'，如：the same mistake as Tom
not so...as/not as...as表示'不如...'，如：not so fast as sound
different from表示'与...不同'，前面可加very、much、a little等修饰语

notes.title: 数量词的用法
content: a lot of既可与复数可数名词连用也可与不可数名词连用
a great/good deal of后接不可数名词
a great/good/large number of后接复数名词
a great/good many of后接复数名词

notes.context: 用于描述机械故障或车辆抛锚
notes.example: My car broke down on the way to work.
They had some trouble finding out the cause of the fire.
I didn't take part in their conversation.

multipleChoice.question: A lot of cars entered for this race. There were ___ cars in it.
multipleChoice.explanation: lots of = a lot of，可以修饰可数名词复数。

multipleChoice.question: It reached a speed of forty miles an hour. It ___ forty miles an hour.

fillInBlanks.sentence: It was the oldest car taking part. There wasn't ___ one.
fillInBlanks.hint: 表示比较级的否定形式

notes.title: 形容词辨析
notes.content: handsome、beautiful、pretty、good-looking的区别：handsome一般用来形容男子或制作精良的物品；beautiful强调内在和外在美的统一，多用于形容女子、孩童、花草等；pretty强调外表美丽，多用于形容女孩和小孩；good-looking男女均适用，表示外表好看。

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 老式汽车比赛是一种独特的汽车文化活动，它不仅展示了汽车工业的发展历史，也让人们欣赏到经典汽车的独特魅力。这种比赛虽然速度不如现代赛车，但更具观赏性和历史价值。
